channel.title: Ps9dev on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ps9dev on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Adapting to PrestaShop 9: Guzzle is gone, what's next?
item.description: PrestaShop 9 is a major release, meaning it introduces breaking changes, including the removal of certain dependencies. One of the most impactful changes for module developers is the removal of Guzzle, a popular HTTP client that many modules relied on.

item.title: Meet the new API Platform-based API in PrestaShop 9
item.description: A new feature in PrestaShop 9 provides the community a new, secure, modern, and extensible API based on the API Platform. In this article I will show you how to start using it.
